description:
Most all of us that live here in Nevada were born in another state, nation, galaxy, time, or universe.  

Everyone that goes to Burning Man come from different places, and then they go home afterwards.  

But we stay and love it here in wonderfully strange Nevada.

The fact is, there are more Nevada Burners per capita than any other nation in the universe -- but there will be all these Burning Man Virgins this year playing in our backyard!

It's that time again.  It's time to take it to The Man and let him, and everyone else know, who we are, and where in the hell we stand, dammit...

AlieNVation!

Please join your fellow Nevada Burners in Black Rock City for a distinguished group photo at 4pm SHARP on Thurdsay, August 30, at The Man (6:00 side).

Of course, please don your finest what-not as representative of being a so-called "Nevadan," hahaha!

Participarty will ensue surrounding this photo shoot.  Mingling, stories, amazing feats, rousing spirituals, ...and booze and music too!

Please bring all your fellow Nevada Burner kin, from whatever state, nation, or planet they originally sprouted from.

The group photo will be freely available to download following the Burning Man, and you can still see the photos of previous years, all here:

tinyurl.com/NevadaBurnersPhotoShoot
print_description: Please join your fellow Nevada Burners for a group photo at 4pm SHARP on Thurdsay, August 30, at The Man (6:00 side).
title: 2012 Nevada Burners Photo Shoot - ALIENVATION

description: Here's your chance to relive those heady days of youngsterhood, release your inner child and express yourself in a BIG way. Once again, Alphabet Block Camp is bringing our two foot high ABC blocks to Black Rock City- ready for YOU to create your own message to the playa, home and beyond. Say what you whatever strikes you. Spell your name, say I LOVE (or HATE) YOU, or just give a random shout out. Once you're finished, snap a photo, visit with us in our shade and give encouragement (and spel-check) to all the other kids at heart.
print_description: Here's your chance to relive those heady days of youngsterhood, release your inner child and express yourself in a BIG way.
title: ABC Block Fun

description:
Come and receive an acupuncture treatment in our community space and experience bliss as your meridians are realigned and rejuvenated. Our acupuncturist runs a community-based acupuncture clinic in Colorado and has brought her needles and skills to the playa for your healing needs. You won't want to miss this opportunity! Come early as treatment will be limited to the first 10-15 burners who come by. See you there!

Denver Community Acupuncture is a fully licensed and board certified holistic health center conveniently located off I-25 and Speer Blvd in the Highlands neighborhood of Denver. Our mission is to provide affordable acupuncture, Chinese herbal medicine, massage therapy, naturopathic medicine, psychotherapy, and skin care to everyone in our community. We work together with our patients and other practitioners in our office to formulate individualized wellness plans that utilize our knowledge of healthy living for a healthy community.
print_description: Receive an acupuncture treatment in our community space. Experience bliss as your meridians are realigned and rejuvenated. Come early, space limited!
title: Acupuncture for the Body, Soul, and Mind

description: Visionary artists Alex and Allyson Grey discuss their psychedelic family business. Featuring Q&A with Android Jones and friends.
print_description: Visionary artists Alex and Allyson Grey discuss their psychedelic family business. Featuring Q&A with Android Jones and friends.
title: Alex & Allyson Grey - Psychedelic Family Business

description:
Serving on the playa for the second year, the Saraswati Tea House is
developing a model for community Tea Houses that offer guests a place
to rest, rehydrate and participate in the Chinese Gong Fu tea ritual. This
form of compassionate hospitality is particularly helpful for people under
stress on their journeys who need a calm place to center
themselves. This talk explores how Tea Houses can provide harm reduction
services and welcome refreshment in challenging environments.
print_description: Annie Oak, founder of the Women's Visionary Congress, discusses the Saraswati Tea House as a model for developing community Tea Houses.
title: Annie Oak - Developing a Community Tea House Model

description: Lose yourself in the moment through improv. Learn to trust your instincts, build off of your environment, and respond positively. Games: Embrace failure! Yes and! 3 things! Alphabet soup! Dolphin training! For beginners.

description: Better living through siblinghood! You are cut from the same cloth, and you know each other (and your parents!) in a way nobody else ever can. Why not design your life to take full advantage of this most special of relationships? Come together as brothers and sisters of all ages and learn how to be partners in adventure on playa and beyond. Feeling alone? Rediscover your long lost sibling on the playa through the scientific brothermometer and sisteradar.
print_description: Calling all siblings pairs on playa to come learn to flourish with the person who shares the most with you! Alone? We'll find your long lost sibling!
title: Better Living Through Siblinghood!

description: Belly dance is one of the best ways to connect with the flow of the body. Though the origin is unknown, belly dance has been linked to ritual fertility dances from thousands of years ago and continues to celebrate the creation of life. A great form of exercise for anybody, it helps to lengthen and strengthen muscles, as well as the mind.
print_description: Belly dance is one of the best ways to connect with the flow of the body. It helps to lengthen and strengthen muscles, as well as the mind.
title: Body Flow: Belly Dance for Beginners

description: Wake up and smell the rich aromas of 100% Kona coffee, latte, and espresso, freshly ground and brewed daily for a bit of playa decadence. Learn about what it's like to grow coffee, how to "cup" coffee (did you know there's a flavor wheel for coffee, just as there is for wine and beer?) and a bit about the culture of Hawaii Nei. Listen to soft Hawaiian music and watch the City arise from its slumbers-or head home for a nap.
print_description: Serving 100% Kona coffee and espresso freshly ground and brewed. Listen to soft Hawaiian music, learn about growing coffee, and watch the City awaken.
title: Cafe Kona

description: When was the last time you saw a group of women drumming? Exactly. We're going to have some drinks, point ourselves at the sunset, and pound shockwaves of all-female rhythmic percussion across the playa. We have lots of drums, but if you got, bring.

description: Learn how to use breath, focus, and meditation to build compassion for yourself and others (even people you don't like!). Develop a Compassionate Image as a future tool for yourself, and get a sense of how you could use the Compassionate Mind Training process in your daily life. This is an experiential workshop. We'll debrief at the end but it will mainly be a guided meditation session and no direct teaching.
print_description: Learn how to use breath, focus, and meditation to build compassion for yourself and others (even people you don't like!)
title: Compassion Meditation and Mind Training

description: Entheogens and psychedelics are powerful catalysts in the evolution of consciousness, and approaching these tools with intentional attention to parameters such as set and setting, quality and dosage of chosen medicine, as well as supporting one's well-being with mindfulness practices, proper nutrition, supplements and herbs can help to prepare voyagers for and enhance the experience of the journey, the integration process, and the days to follow. This work is intended to inform and empower this community about the health aspects of entheogens and psychedelics and the role of natural medicine in creating a culture of benefit maximization for all beings.
print_description: Talk by Doctuh Naughtilee how to optimize entheogenic/psychedelic experiences with nutrition, herbs and supplements.
title: Entheogenic Empowerment: Enhancing the Journey

description: Yup, just like in the olden days. We're gonna dress up in classic Village People gear, blast that disco, and have a boogieass-getdown-freakout as we weld together plate steel cutouts to make a life-sized A Cavallo carousel horse – but with a unicorn horn! We can hear the squeals now. Bring your designer eye protection and be ready to get sparks in your ass if you're wearing those chaps! (We'd remind you of the outfits, but we like imagining y'all trying to remember out loud – "So it's Indian chief, construction worker…)
print_description: Jus like in the olden days, come dress like Village People, blast disco, and have a boogieass freakout as we we weld together a life-size unicorn!

Listen to live music next door on our "You're The Limit Stage" Musicians' Happy Hour.

description: Whistling is in a first place tie as the most portable instrument around, but some people don't know how to use it! I want to help them learn, help them improve and let them whistle anywhere they please. This workshop will be for beginners and intermediate whistlers, with new techniques taught. I especially want to help first-timers who have been frustrated by trying to learn in the past. I'd like to have a couple of experienced volunteers to help me teach people in small groups.
print_description: Whistling is in a first place tie as the most portable instrument around, but some people don't know how to use it! Come learn how.
title: Learning to Whistle

description:
Since 2003, Palenque Norte has been the Burning Man reincarnation of the legendary Entheobotany Conferences held near the ancient Mayan temples near Palenque, Mexico. There, Terence McKenna, Jonathan Ott, Ann & Sasha Shulgin, and a host of other luminaries held forth. This year we are featuring many visionary talks, community circles, art and performances on subjects such as: the psychedelic experience and research, technological transformation of the human condition and far future, the weird and the strange, and healing plant medicines. 

Bruce Damer, Annie Oak, Robert Forte and many others (TBA) will be joining us for three afternoons of lively sessions which will be held in The Crystal Cavern at Camp Above the Limit. Our schedules are posted daily.

As is our tradition, all sessions will be later broadcast in the Psychedelic Salon podcast.
print_description: Visionary talks and discussion, community circles & art: consciousness, psychedelics, technology & human future, weird and strange, healing medicines.
title: Palenque Norte Speaker Series

description: The playa sibling census will be open Wednesday thru Friday from 4-5pm to allow all siblings (loosely defined) to be counted.Come to make your sibling pledge, and be counted in the census by sealing a shared secret in the Wall of Sibling Secrets. You will be sent on your way with new energy to unlock the awesomeness of having a sibling on the playa (and in your life)!Thank you, brethren and sistren, for strengthening the city with your bond!
print_description: Come and be counted! Cement your bro- and sisterhood by adding to the vault of sibling secrets. Thanks for strengthening the city with your bond!

print_description: The Lollipop Guild will perform non-binding, diverse and creative Playa Weddings for all. Form a bond with anyone, any number of anyone's or anything!

description: In "Religion for Atheists" Alain de Botton argues that "rather than mocking religions, agnostics and atheists should instead steal from them – because they're packed with good ideas on how we might live and arrange our societies." This discussion is about distilling the tools of religions from the dogmas that surround them. (Don't don't throw out the baby with the holy water!) Rather than trying to cover this whole topic in a single workshop, the goal will be to introduce the general concepts while facilitating the sharing of resources (books, articles, quotes, etc.) for people to explore on their own. Please bring something to share.
print_description: This discussion is about distilling the tools of religions from the dogmas that surround them. Please bring something to share.
title: Spirituality for Atheists

description:
Virgins looking for other Virgin or not so to play with.  

Relaxe with arts and craft.  Decorate your body and playa gear while our virgins serve you tea.  Come and chill in our dome.  Bring over supplies to share if you care.  Bring tidbits for tea if you please.  Our virgins will paint your body and gears.  Just be a dear.

We are open for fun everyday from noon til dusk or until our playa virgins revolt.

Bubbles, Bubbles, everywhere - virgins will also be playing on the playa.   Find the bubble trails if you're looking for fun.

Two Rules to live by:
- Have Fun, No Drama
- Live, Learn and Grow
print_description: Come for a tea party with Body Paint, Goggle and Playa Gear decoration, and to blow some bubbles at Camp BUBBLE WARRIOR everyday from noon til dusk.
title: Tea with Bubbles, Body paint, Gear Decoration

description:
By night, indulge yourself in transcendent experience as you enter 
another world within The Crystal Cavern. Surrounded by two story 
fluorescent crystals, vividly colored mushrooms, and silk mandalas, enjoy live and recorded music - mandolin, shamanic icaros, world beat, down tempo, and at least one night of psytrance. Come lounge on the soft, fluffy pillows and absorb our ambiance, light shows, and music.

By day, our comfortable 40-foot dome hosts the Palenque Norte Speaker Series (see separate listing). Enjoy presentations from leaders in the visionary, entheogenic, and psychedelic communities.

In the morning, bring your yoga mat and join us for morning and evening community yoga practice in our yoga area. Leave the dust behind and expand your body and mind.
print_description: Visually striking 40’ dome lounge with giant fluorescent crystals, mushrooms, fluffy pillows. Live & recorded music–down tempo, world beat, psytrance.
title: The Crystal Cavern

description:
A smorgasbord of performance art, music, and spoken word. Bring your  5 -10 min performance to share. Or participate in the Battle of Words hip hop and spoken word slam down. Come early if you have special tech requests. On Playa collaborations and works in progress encouraged. Bear Margaritas for all!!

The Salon is a night of creative expression. Our community started hosting salons in January 2010 as a safe space for the folks of Synchronicity and our friends to share finished or unfinished works of art, poetry, song, or any form of creative release.  The idea was to encourage people in the community to create, share, and hear thoughts or ideas from fellow creative souls.  It has since expanded, and we have enjoyed works of musicians, poets, storytellers, palindromists, historians, novelists, ramblers, gamblers, painters, filmmakers, drunks, fathers, mothers, lovers, dreamers, and psychedelic clowns from all over this land!
A crowd of lovely folks from across the playa will be gathering at 7.30 pm in preparation for the night's event.  A list will be roaming around, with 20 spots to fill. As 8 pm nears, we pile in front of our stage and are greeted by the lovely host of the evening.  From there.. anything goes!
print_description: Come to Camp Sync for a wonderful evening of community and creativity. Artists are invited to share their hearts/talents. Join the artistic reverie!
title: The Salon at Summer Camp Sync. @ Sundown

description:
The Saraswati Tea House offers fine teas and herbal infusions served in the Chinese Gong Fu tea tradition. The Tea House is a refuge where guests can rest, rehydrate and have quiet conversations. The tea ceremony provides stillness in the midst of chaos. All are welcome at the tea tables where servers offer compassionate hospitality and moist towelettes to refresh journeying visitors.

The Saraswati Tea House has both indoor and outdoor lounge spaces serving tea and providing an oasis for visitors who need a place to reflect on the ebb and flow of their personal cosmic journey. Tended day and night by our gentle tea servers, we honor Saraswati, the Hindu Goddess of Cosmic Knowledge, by welcoming those who need respite, insight, and a kind word during their passage towards wisdom and evolved consciousness. You are welcome to rest and reflect at the Saraswati Tea House during your transformation and initiation.
print_description: A tranquil lounge providing fine teas and herbal infusions in the Chinese Gong Fu tradition for those needing rest, rehydration, and conversation.
title: The Saraswati Tea House

description: Get funky to the bass while you tie ribbons on your handle bars. Shake a tail feather with your spray paint cans. Ease on down to A Cavallo Tribal Thunder and get your groove on while you pimp your bike! Materials provided, donations accepted and appreciated.
print_description: Ease on down to A Cavallo Tribal Thunder and get your groove on while you pimp your bike! Materials provided, donations accepted and appreciated.
title: Wheelie Funk Shui

description:
Camp Above The Limit is hosting an open mic Musicians' Happy Hour Monday thru Thursday from 4:00 pm till 8:00 pm with a grand performance on Saturday. 
We will have scheduled and ad hoc performances promoting musical diversity, radical self expression, participation, and entertainment. 

If you are a musician or performance artist and wish to play on the "You're The Limit Stage" bring yourself, your talent and your instrument to Camp Above The Limit and participate in our Musical Diversity Program! It doesn't matter what it is! From violin to kazoo, guitar to ocarina, banjo, sarod, sitar, Spanish bagpipes, heck even accordions are welcome. 

Bluegrass, Shamanic, Old Timey, Country, Rock, Classical, Irish, English, Morris Dancing, French, Middle Eastern, Balkan, Afghan, Indian, Barber Shop, or performance art. Whether it be your whole band or your radically self-expressive solo act, bring it! We will provide sound and we'll have other musicians for accompaniment: drums, guitar, mandolin, most likely anything you would need. We will be putting together an all-star performance on Saturday for all those who participate so come be a part of a great community of musicians and performance artists and share your gifts with us and the playa! Community is what makes the Burn so great and within all communities there is greatness! Come share yours with all of us!
print_description: Musicians' Happy Hour! Open mic, scheduled and ad hoc performances promoting musical diversity, radical self expression, and great entertainment!
title: You're The Limit Stage
